stochastic_function: lambda market_salary, company_culture: {1: 0.7, 0: 0.2, -1: 0.1} if market_salary == 1 and company_culture == 1 else {1: 0.5, 0: 0.3, -1: 0.2} if market_salary == 1 and company_culture == 0 else {1: 0.3, 0: 0.4, -1: 0.3} if market_salary == 1 and company_culture == -1 else {1: 0.6, 0: 0.3, -1: 0.1} if market_salary == 0 and company_culture == 1 else {1: 0.4, 0: 0.4, -1: 0.2} if market_salary == 0 and company_culture == 0 else {1: 0.2, 0: 0.5, -1: 0.3} if market_salary == 0 and company_culture == -1 else {1: 0.5, 0: 0.3, -1: 0.2} if market_salary == -1 and company_culture == 1 else {1: 0.3, 0: 0.4, -1: 0.3} if market_salary == -1 and company_culture == 0 else {1: 0.1, 0: 0.5, -1: 0.4}

lambda recruitment_decision, workload, employee_productivity: {1: 0.80, 0: 0.15, -1: 0.05} if recruitment_decision == 'hire' and workload == 1 and employee_productivity == 1 else {1: 0.30, 0: 0.50, -1: 0.20} if recruitment_decision == 'hire' and workload == 1 and employee_productivity == 0 else {1: 0.20, 0: 0.60, -1: 0.20} if recruitment_decision == 'hire' and workload == 1 and employee_productivity == -1 else {1: 0.70, 0: 0.20, -1: 0.10} if recruitment_decision == 'hire' and workload == 0 and employee_productivity == 1 else {1: 0.40, 0: 0.40, -1: 0.20} if recruitment_decision == 'hire' and workload == 0 and employee_productivity == 0 else {1: 0.30, 0: 0.50, -1: 0.20} if recruitment_decision == 'hire' and workload == 0 and employee_productivity == -1 else {1: 0.50, 0: 0.40, -1: 0.10} if recruitment_decision == 'hire' and workload == -1 and employee_productivity == 1 else {1: 0.20, 0: 0.50, -1: 0.30} if recruitment_decision == 'hire' and workload == -1 and employee_productivity == 0 else {1: 0.10, 0: 0.60, -1: 0.30} if recruitment_decision == 'hire' and workload == -1 and employee_productivity == -1 else {1: 0.70, 0: 0.20, -1: 0.10} if recruitment_decision == 'do not hire' and workload == 1 and employee_productivity == 1 else {1: 0.40, 0: 0.40, -1: 0.20} if recruitment_decision == 'do not hire' and workload == 1 and employee_productivity == 0 else {1: 0.30, 0: 0.50, -1: 0.20} if recruitment_decision == 'do not hire' and workload == 1 and employee_productivity == -1 else {1: 0.70, 0: 0.20, -1: 0.10} if recruitment_decision == 'do not hire' and workload == 0 and employee_productivity == 1 else {1: 0.40, 0: 0.40, -1: 0.20} if recruitment_decision == 'do not hire' and workload == 0 and employee_productivity == 0 else {1: 0.30, 0: 0.50, -1: 0.20} if recruitment_decision == 'do not hire' and workload == 0 and employee_productivity == -1 else {1: 0.60, 0: 0.30, -1: 0.10} if recruitment_decision == 'do not hire' and workload == -1 and employee_productivity == 1 else {1: 0.40, 0: 0.40, -1: 0.20} if recruitment_decision == 'do not hire' and workload == -1 and employee_productivity == 0 else {1: 0.30, 0: 0.40, -1: 0.30} if recruitment_decision == 'do not hire' and workload == -1 and employee_productivity == -1 else {}
